title: Wine & dine at Hotel du Vin
text: Telegraph readers have the chance to wine, dine and stay at our experts’ favourite Hotel du Vin properties across the country, including Brighton (from £325), Bristol (from £300), Cambridge (from £365), Newcastle (from £260) and Edinburgh (from £315; see telegraph.co.uk/hotelduvinoffer for full list). The night’s stay includes breakfast, three-course dinner and wine pairings, complimentary late check-out (1pm) and room upgrades at check-in (subject to availability). Book online only at hotelduvin.com ; enter promo code "TELEG" when prompted. Our expert says of the Bristol outpost: “The menu revolves around hearty Gallic dishes such as Comté cheese soufflé, boeuf bourgignon (served on the bone), Toulouse sausages with creamy mash and 28-day dry-aged steaks – including a sumptuous Chateaubriand for two. Wine-matching tips are on hand from the sommelier: as you’d expect.” The recently opened Hotel du Vin & Bistro Cannizaro House in Wimbledon What’s included • Accommodation in a standard room for two people • Full English breakfast • Three-course dinner from the à la carte menu • One glass of wine for each course, recommended by the sommelier • One bottle of still/sparking water for the dinner • Complimentary late check-out by 1pm • Complimentary room upgrade at check-in (subject to availability) •Read the full review: Hotel du Vin Brighton ; Hotel du Vin & Bistro Cannizaro House Wimbledon ; Hotel du Vin Bristol Telegraphtravel Follow @telegraphtravel
